caption: render time: 86s, primitives: 10, reflects: 4, refracts: 6, shadow samples: 32, supersampling: 2×2, lights: 1

caption: render time: 188s, primitives: 10, reflects: 4, refracts: 6, shadow samples: 64, supersampling: 2×2, lights: 1

caption: render time: 696s, primitives: 10, reflects: 4, refracts: 6, shadow samples: 64, supersampling: 2×2, lights: 1

title: Test scene (wide, 64 shadow samples), 1024px×512px
caption: render time: 222s, primitives: 10, reflects: 4, refracts: 6, shadow samples: 64, supersampling: 2×2, lights: 1

title: UV parameterisation test, 512px×512px
caption: u: red channel, v: green channel

title: Image texture test, 512px×512px
caption: Plane parameterisation did not work well for image textures since ImageTexture was still missing a scale parameter.

title: Glossy reflections
caption: Glossy reflections on the shiny sphere.

title: Global illunimation test (WIP)
caption: Note the focusing of light and colour bleed on objects. It's blocky because it uses a cube to query cached photons instead of (rightly) using k-nearest neighbours. As a side effect of this, the irradiance is also guesstimated, which is why the image brightness doesn't look right at all.

title: Skybox test, 1024px×1024px
caption: This scene was used to check for proper stitching and orientation of the skybox cube map. The entire scene (nearly) can be seen with just a reflective sphere!

title: Skybox animation test, 512px×512px, 250 frames, 25fps
caption: render time: 796s

title: Fresnel test, 852px×480px, 250 frames, 25fps
caption: render time: 1840s (2014 i7 4790K @ 4.12GHz). This scene was used to test the fresnel implementation. The reflection in the floor fades as the camera tilts down.

title: Bunny with spheres, 512px×512px
caption: render time: 1559s, triangles: ≈300, reflects: 4, refracts: 6, shadow samples: 32, supersampling: 2×2, lights: 2

title: Bunny with spheres, no skybox, 2048px×2048px
caption: Triangles: ≈300

title: Teapot, 512px×512px
caption: render time: 472s, triangles: ≈2500, reflects: 4, refracts: 6, shadow samples: 32, supersampling: 2×2, lights: 1

title: Teapot (white), 512px×512px
caption: Note the higher reflectivity at the edges (grazing angles) and the obvious blocky shadows caused by the lower polygon model. Shading is still smooth due to the interpolation of normals.

title: Cow, 512px×512px
caption: render time: 941s, triangles: ≈5000, reflects: 4, refracts: 6, shadow samples: 32, supersampling: 2×2, lights: 1

title: Cow (broken), 512px×512px
caption: This happened because triangles which intersected multiple octree nodes were only added to one node.

title: Lucy, 512px×512px
caption: render time: 814s, triangles: ≈55K, reflects: 4, refracts: 6, shadow samples: 16, supersampling: 2×2, lights: 1

title: Lucy, no skybox, 1024px×1024px
caption: triangles: ≈55K

title: Lucy, 3072px×3072px
caption: Note that the background (skybox) image is blurred and not blocky thanks to the bilinear filtering of image textures. This skybox face has a texture resolution of 1024px×1024px.

title: Sponza, 512px×512px
caption: triangles: ≈27K, 2 lights

title: Sibenik, 512px×512px
caption: render time: 1855s (Wolfdale @ 3.15GHz), 344s (2014 i7 4790K @ 4.12GHz), triangles: ≈70K, shadow samples: 8, supersampling: 2×2, 3 lights

title: Sibenik, 427px×240px, 175 frames, 25fps
caption: render time: around 8 hours, shadow samples: 8, no supersampling

title: Heptoroid (white)
caption: render time: 3179s, shadow samples: 64, supersampling: 2×2, lights: 1

title: Heptoroid (shiny)
caption: render time: 2742s. The refract version was too slow; I didn't dare render it.

title: Heptoroid (refractive)
caption: At an IOR of 1.0, with only the refractive contribution (no reflections). I can't tell if this looks correct.

title: Heptoroid (refractive)
caption: render time: 30107s, reflect levels: 3, refract levels: 16, shadow samples: 32, supersampling: 2×2. At a refractive index of 1.5 (glass). Upping from 2 to 3 reflect levels killed the render time.

title: Heptoroid (refractive)
caption: At an IOR of 2.7.

title: Easing test (60fps)
caption: This used easing settings of "0.0 0.05 0.1 1.0". At 33% time in to the next keyframe the camera would have only moved 5% in distance to the next keyframe.

title: Tachikoma
caption: render time: 3748s, shadow samples: 64, supersampling: 2×2, lights: 1
